Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Represents a customer who has purchased access to the Mega Millions Maximizer number generation service.

accessCodeId.description: The ID of the access code assigned to this customer.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the customer was created.

AccessCode.title: AccessCode
AccessCode.description: Represents a unique access code granted to a customer after purchase, allowing them to generate number combinations.

isUsed.description: Indicates whether the access code has been used to generate numbers.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the code was created.

usedAt.description: Timestamp of when the code was used.

/customers/{customerId}.description: Stores customer information, including their email and a reference to their access code.

/access_codes/{accessCodeId}.description: Stores single-use access codes. The 'isUsed' field tracks redemption status.

/roles_admin/{userId}.description: Grants admin role to a user. The existence of a document with isAdmin:true grants privileges.
